text:
PRC-Saltillo's Evaluator Loan Program is the ideal solution for AAC Evaluators. The program provides equipment to be used for evaluations at no cost for up to four weeks. In addition, evaluators will receive consistent and reliable support from one of our knowledgeable AAC Consultants. If you have additional questions or need support, contact your local consultant Let’s get started! In order to receive an evaluation loan, this online application must be completed in full. The evaluation loan period is up to four weeks.  I agree to return the evaluation loan to PRC-Saltillo prior to the due date if it is not needed for the entire 4-week time.  If the evaluation loan is not returned in accordance with this agreement, I understand I am unable to borrow additional equipment until it is returned. Evaluation devices include most available configurations (i.e., all vocabularies, symbol sets, voices). Evaluation devices are non-dedicated (i.e., have access to the operating system to run applications and provide internet access). If the client’s device will have third party funding, check with your consultant about available configurations. If you would like your device set up to start in a particular vocabulary, please note that vocabulary in the comments/special instruction box. Choose one No options available. Please select a device to show potential options. Please confirm your choices, then click submit down below. Finalize Signature I agree, and it is my intent, to sign this Evaluation Loan Program Application. I have read and agree to the Evaluation Loan Program Terms and Conditions. I understand that my signing and submitting this Application in this fashion is the legal equivalent of having placed my handwritten signature on the submitted document. Before clicking “Submit,” please review your information to ensure it is correct. Upon receipt of your request, a confirmation will be sent to the email provided. Please be sure to look it over carefully to confirm all information is correct. Your request will be reviewed by your consultant and you will be contacted by PRC-Saltillo within 3-5 business days. We look forward to working with you! Your request has been submitted. If you have any further questions or concerns please don't hesitate to get in touch with us at info@prc-saltillo.com. A confirmation has been sent to your email, thanks again! Return to home page 
                    PRC-Saltillo
                    1022 Heyl Road
                    Wooster, OH 44691
